name: WKAudioFileQueuePlayer
desc: An object that controls playback of one or more audio items. DeprecatedUse the AVFoundation frameworkâ€™s AVPlayer and AVQueuePlayer classes instead.

items.name: init(items: [WKAudioFilePlayerItem])
items.desc: Creates and returns a player initialized with an array of items.

items.name: func advanceToNextItem()
items.desc: Ends playback of the current item and begins playing the next item in the queue.

items.name: func appendItem(WKAudioFilePlayerItem)
items.desc: Adds the specified item to the end of the queue.

items.name: func removeItem(WKAudioFilePlayerItem)
items.desc: Removes the specified item from the queue.

items.name: func removeAllItems()
items.desc: Removes all items from the queue.
